| 이후경 |                         |

## 🖥 Getting Started

1. `Clone` the repository

   ```markdown
   $ git clone https://github.com/wanted-pre-onboarding-4/Fruitte.git
   ```

2. `Install` dependencies

   ```markdown
   $ npm install
   ```

3. `start` the project

   ```markdown
   $ npm start
   ```
